casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 7, 2013

[Cite as 11/07/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-4899.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0096. Cleveland v. McCardle.

Cuyahoga App. Nos. 98230 and 98231, 2012-Ohio-5749. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County.

Upon consideration of the joint motion for divided argument time of appellant and amicus curiae, state of Ohio, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
